title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
author: Fysi
aiHeadline: AI takes over the world by designing algorithms, one step closer to Skynet with AlphaEvolve, the Gemini-powered coding agent that probably just coded itself into sentience.

title: What is HDR, anyway?
author: _kush
aiHeadline: HDR: because regular photos weren't confusing enough, now your camera can make everything look like a painting, but only if you understand the technical jargon.

title: Bus stops here: Shanghai lets riders design their own routes
author: anigbrowl
aiHeadline: Shanghai's new bus routes: because traffic wasn't bad enough, now riders can design their own routes, which will inevitably lead to buses going in circles.

title: Writing that changed how I think about programming languages
author: r4um
aiHeadline: Programming languages: because choosing between Python and Java wasn't stressful enough, now you have to rethink everything you know about them, thanks to this enlightening article.

title: The recently lost file upload feature in the Nextcloud app for Android
author: morsch
aiHeadline: Nextcloud's file upload feature: because you didn't have enough problems with cloud storage, now you can't even upload files anymore, and Google is probably to blame.
